revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Vast Poni Canyon |image = [[File:Vast Poni Canyon.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Vast Poni Canyon. |tokens = 1,125,000 |location = North of Ancient Poni Path. }}
'''Vast Poni Canyon''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, The [[Gyms#Alola|Dragonium-Z]] [[File:DragoniumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 15,992,044 HP.
